title: They reckon a woman's world's just it and a bit
creator_credit: South Australian Film Corporation, Penny Chapman and Meg Stewart
brief_description: Five housewives, living in a housing estate in outer Adelaide, tell how they organized a mutual self-help group to overcome the boredom, frustration and loneliness of living in suburbia.
